page.title: 02HOUSING IN HUMBIE
page.content: MANY HOUSES IN OUR AREA ARE OVER ONE HUNDRED YEARS OLD.IN OUR SURVEY WE VISITED FORTY FIVE HOUSES.MOST PEOPLE HAVE SOLID FUEL HEATING.FUEL IS EASY TO GET AS THE COALMAN COMES ROUND AND THERE ARE VARIOUS SAWMILLS NEARBY.VERY FEW PEOPLE USE GAS AS THERE IS NONE PIPED TO THE AREA.ABOUT ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY PEOPLE LIVE HERE.ONLY FOUR OF THOSE WE INTERVIEWED HAD LIVED HERE MORE THAN THIRTY YEARS.THERE ARE ONLY SIX CHILDREN UNDER FIVE.MOST HOUSES HAVE TWO,THREE,OR FOUR BEDROOMS WITH BETWEEN TWO TO FOUR PEOPLE LIVING THERE.EIGHT PEOPLE LIVE ALONE.
